name: nowrap
main_interests: Metaphysics, epistemology, ethics, consciousness, self-consciousness, literature, political philosophy, ontology
notableworks: ''La Nausée'', ''Le Mur'', ''Les Mouches'', ''L'Être et le Néant'', ''Huis clos'', ''L'existentialisme est un humanisme'', ''Les Mains sales'', ''Critique de la raison dialectique'', ''Les Mots''
influenced: Raymond Aron, Georges Bataille, Alain Badiou, Frithjof Bergmann, Albert Camus, Simone de Beauvoir
notable_ideas: Bad faith, "existence precedes essence," nothingness, “every consciousness is a non-positional consciousness of itself," Sartrean terminology
